Plot: Two young wolves at opposite ends of their pack's social order are thrown together into a foreign land and need each other to return home, but love complicates everything.
Title: Alpha and Omega
Writer: Chris Denk (screenplay), Ben Gluck (additional screenplay), Ben Gluck (original story), Steve Moore (original screenplay and story)
Actors: Justin Long, Hayden Panettiere, Dennis Hopper, Danny Glover
tomatoConsensus: With bland visuals and a dull, predictable plot, Alpha and Omega is a runt in 2010's animated litter.
